name: Stab-Man
description:
Fast-paced game about killing all Robots from behind, with included teleport mechanic.

This game DOES NOT have any "challenge", the only challenge for you is to beat your or your friend's best time.

Horrifying robots has taken the whole universe! Join the forces, get into robot's backs and STAB! Will you be the best Stab-Man in the universe?

This game was made for "$100 JTAGame Jam #3" Game Jam. The theme was "3-Rules" and I had to follow their tutorial on teleportation.

Everything in the game is created by me in limit of 6 days.*

*This does not include:

  • Texture of "Asphalt 002"
  • Code from tutorial in the video

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
